import{useTranslation}from"react-i18next";import*as Yup from"yup";import{enumValidation}from"@configs";export var YubResetPassword=function YubResetPassword(){//page hook
var _useTranslation=useTranslation(),t=_useTranslation.t;return{password:Yup.string().required(t("validation.required",{returnObjects:true,name:t("page.auth._password")})).min(enumValidation.MIN_PASSWORD,t("validation.min",{returnObjects:true,name:t("page.auth._password"),number:enumValidation.MIN_PASSWORD})).max(enumValidation.MAX_PASSWORD,t("validation.max_length_number",{returnObjects:true,name:t("page.auth._password"),number:enumValidation.MAX_PASSWORD})),conformPassword:Yup.string().required(t("validation.required",{returnObjects:true,name:t("page.auth.confirm_password")})).oneOf([Yup.ref("password"),null],t("validation.password_must_match"))};};
